meanings.sent1: The old sweater was linted and looked fuzzy.
meanings.sent2: She wore a linted scarf to keep warm in the winter.
meanings.sent3: The linted teddy bear looked like it had a fluffy coat.
meanings.sent4: The linted fabric felt soft and cozy against her skin.
meanings.sent5: The linted pillow was so comfortable to rest on.

meanings.sent1: She linted her coat before going out to dinner.
meanings.sent2: He linted his pants to make them look neat.
meanings.sent3: The cat linted the couch by rubbing against it.
meanings.sent4: She linted the carpet with a special roller.
meanings.sent5: He linted his hat before wearing it to the party.
